translations: 骚乱，混乱；故意伤害罪，重伤罪；蓄意破坏

sentences.sentence: There was absolute mayhem when everyone tried to get out at once.
sentences.translation: 众人蜂拥而出，造成了极大的混乱。

sentences.sentence: Their arrival caused mayhem as crowds of refugees rushed towards them.
sentences.translation: 他们的到来引起了混乱，一群群难民冲向他们。

sentences.sentence: With monetary mayhem now retreating into memory, European countries can breathe a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.translation: 随着金融混乱已成往事，欧洲国家全都可以松口气了。
